item.title: Root Cause of Invalid memory setting: memory reservation (sched.mem.min) should be equal to memsize (memsize)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: While working on reconfiguring my home lab setup, and migrating all the vSphere resources into a single cluster I ran into a problem powering on one of the VMs which used to run on a single host. The power on operation yielded the following error message: Invalid memory setting: memory reservation (sched.mem.min) should be equal to memsize (memsize) [showhide type=“errorstack” more_text=“Show error stack (%s More Words)”] **Task Details:** Status: Invalid memory setting: memory reservation (sched.
